review:
I was diagnosed with the disease known BRAIN TUBERCULOSIS ,& if urgently operation was not done then i would have lost my precious life .At such a critical situation ,i was supposed to be operated within 24 hours ,otherwise i may had lost my life &urgently  THERE WAS NEED of lots of money .So hospital administration cooperated with us & operation was performed ,then,after operation i was in I.C.U.for 27 days then after i was removed from their & it was  hope less feeling for me.........
but at last THE THANKFUL WORD TO DR. to operate such a critical case &today i'm living my happy life just because of you THANK YOU FROM BOTTOM OF MY HEART.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Diabetes Treatment,Joint pains Adult Vaccination,Blood Pressure Changes,
review:
** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** ******* Simply superb in diagnosing the patient. Always suggest only required lab tests to perform if any. 
My mom is taking treatment from him for more than 2 years now and we are very much satisfied by his treatment. Truly honest doctor.
* ********* ******** ******* ************ Very humane.. Would ask for investigations only if required.

Very dissatisfied with his choice of medicines given to me and wife for Covid treatment, ****** ****** *** No courtesy to enquire about patients health, **** **** ******* ** ****** We had to get admitted to hospital *** *** ****** **** ***** ********** ******* *** ********* ************ We wasted one week of crucial time under this guy’s treatment. The ironical part is me and my entire family had been under his primary care since a decade now, still he never bothered to once sms and check the status of our health. Extremely disappointed with him *** ** ******* ** ****** ******** ******** *** ******* *********
The doctor was attentive and reassured the patient that she will be fine after taking the prescribed medicines.
Good understanding of the issue and explanation of treatment's procedure.overall good experience feeling relaxed.
This was the first time I visited the doctor. The doctor listened to the problem very carefully and prescribed medicines. The time to meet the doctor was very high
Doctor with lot of experience. He does not recommend unnecessary and costly treatments unless required.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Positive attitude and behaviour towards patients.... Gave his full time for the doubt clearing........

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My father in law had hyperacidity and severe gastric troubles .after 1st treatment his problems solved.
